title: Pythagoras & Caffeine
description: Proof: This Shirt Is Awesome. Math teachers, unite — this clever geometry-meets-coffee design is your new classroom armor.

title: Periodic Sarcasm
description: Witty, science-fueled sarcasm delivered straight from the periodic table. For chemistry teachers who mix brilliance with banter.

title: Crazy? We'll Train You!
description: An EDUHaHa classic — perfect for new hires, veteran teachers, and anyone bold enough to walk into a staff lounge unprepared.
